website_summaries.verdict: When you want a thick putter grip, the Fatso is one of the largest models available at 1.67 inches in diameter.
pros: Includes a no-slip polyurethane outer layer that'll help you maintain your grip on the club in all weather
Even though it's a thick putter grip, the Fatso doesn't add much weight to your putter
Offered in several different color combinations
cons: Not really made for those with smaller hands, as it'll be uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Oversize Putter Grip
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on putter - like the oversize grip for control of putting stroke. Try in a sporting goods store before buying - may not be for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Greenmover

customer_reviews.title: Large putter grip
customer_reviews.text: The putter grip is pretty big and may not be for every one. I like it. It helps to keep my grip more relaxed. The only downside for me is that it doesn't fit as easily into my putter slot in my golf bag. Not the grips fault, just something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: J. Heebsh

customer_reviews.title: It helps me.
customer_reviews.text: If you have no idea how a putter grip this size could help you, then don't get it. But if you know the fault it can fix and you have that fault, then get it and practice with it. It helps.
customer_reviews.author: Booker D

customer_reviews.title: Great High Quality Grip
customer_reviews.text: Love this high quality, great feeling, highly durable grip. I have used the Super Stroke putter grip for several years and love it. Tried another brand for about a year and went back to Super Stroke because they feel so great. The fatso 2.0 has greatly improved my putting because it relaxes your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Really really big. Feels weird. Easy to install. Seems like good quality. Looks ok.
customer_reviews.text: Too big. Easy to install. Barely fits my golf bag. Difficult to get my putter out and put it back. Maybe I just need to get used to it. But it’s really large. Feels weird.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Great Grip
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know what to expect from this grip and it was truly great. First it was really easy to replace the grip myself. First time using the grip felt very comfortable in my hands. My hands are large not sure how smaller hands would do with this grip size. It takes getting used to as you start to get better contact with the ball since you are not using your hands as much. Very happy I purchased this grip.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sieg

customer_reviews.title: Great FATSO
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion as a veteran golfer, this is the best putter grip on the market. It really takes your strong/tight hand grip out of play.
customer_reviews.author: Giveaway Gator

customer_reviews.title: Dont hesitate to buy this
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Love the feel. Cant go back to a smaller grip. I use a reverse or left hand down. Highly recommend this grip.
customer_reviews.author: WyomingTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Thick and installed just like normal size grip
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son and he lives the thicker grip. Easy to install just like any other grip.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel for my S. Cameron putter.
customer_reviews.text: Put this grip on the day it arrived. Took it to the course the next day and it felt very nice. Highly recommend....
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: My putting stroke improved the first practice session with the Fatso,
customer_reviews.author: Jim Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grip
customer_reviews.text: This is a great oversize grip. Feels good in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in decades the putter feels stable and comfortable in my hands. My putting accuracy has also improved.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: feels great in the hands, good feel on the putting green. Puts have improved.
customer_reviews.author: Santiego Grijalva

customer_reviews.title: Love the Putter Grip
customer_reviews.text: I love the grip on putter it is comfortable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Russ S- Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the control and feel I get from using the grip. Very comfortable in the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my new grip
customer_reviews.text: It really made a great improvement in my putter control
customer_reviews.author: Shorty

customer_reviews.title: I didn't do my research
customer_reviews.text: Can't rate it, the 5.0 was too big, couldn't feel the putter head or weight. The 2.0 was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: should know your way around a shop
customer_reviews.text: love this product but if i were to buy it again i would definetly have a pro install it. tough to keep straight and to slide it all the way on
customer_reviews.author: Jared Orrock

customer_reviews.title: Very large
customer_reviews.text: Giant, very fat grip. Just a little larger than I though. I am 6'4" with large hands and it is slightly uncomfortable but useable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jane Vester

customer_reviews.title: 0 I put on my son putter is much better fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: Very large grip I have big hands and this just fits, the 3.0 I put on my son putter is much better fit and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Penkaty

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this grip!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size to use as a "2 thumb putter grip" I like to hold my thumbs next to each other with a pendulum effect from the shoulders down.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Younger

customer_reviews.title: Fatso is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Makes me feel like I can control the putter face with greater precision but takes some getting used to on distance. By the end of my first round I was putting on a more consistent line with increased confidence. Looks great and is easy to install too.
customer_reviews.author: JMAC

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Adding this grip will take strokes off of your golf game. Boom! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Heather Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: improved putting
customer_reviews.text: large grip improves putter head control, every little bit helps.
customer_reviews.author: ken hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Works well and a good price. This was for the wife where her old grip was worn out. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: fparker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and works great! Loved the color selection available.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B Nordstrom-Kernstock

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and was no more difficult to install than ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected! Very good quality and was no more difficult to install than any other grip
customer_reviews.author: Jpax

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, and has a great feel, now hopefully it shaves a few strokes off the game!
customer_reviews.author: imahussey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice grip!!!! Haven't missed a put since i got it! Yeah right!
customer_reviews.author: terry schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, nice grip, right price. What else can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly as stated in the description. I really think that this will help me be more consistent with the game. That said i have used it 2x and it does take time to get used to the larger grip if you are used to the thinner one. i would suggest getting some putting practice in at the range first.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this grip I think its saving me 2 strokes a round
customer_reviews.author: tvmcintyre

customer_reviews.title: ... 100% keep you from getting risty in your stroke love it
customer_reviews.text: Has improved my putting 100% keep you from getting risty in your stroke love it
customer_reviews.author: Earl Schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This grip is great. I feel so much more relaxed over the ball.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: If you like way oversized
customer_reviews.text: it was a nice grip but however it was not the one for me
customer_reviews.author: Williams123

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice grip but maybe too big for my putting style...It really is a fat grip
customer_reviews.author: Richard

product_meta.title: SuperStroke Fatso 5.0 Putter Grip, Oversized, Lightweight Golf Grips, Non-slip, 10.50"L X 1.67"W, USGA Approved
product_meta.description:
The SuperStroke Legacy putter grips are our original patented design and shapes. The oversized grips ensure even grip pressure and engage the big muscles in your stroke to minimize wrist action. The No Taper Technology has helped millions of golfers achieve a smoother, more consistent, and more reliable putting stroke. Tourney after tourney, major after major, these grips have come to redefine not only the putter grip, but putting as a whole.

Performance Characteristics

 * Feel level: High
 * Tack level: High
 * Wet Friction Level: Mid
 * Feedback Level: Mid

Specs

 * 1.67” Diameter
 * 10.50” Length
 * 90g Weight
 * .580R Core
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR GRIP - The Super Stroke Fatso 5.0 Putter Grip is 1.67" in Diameter and is Made of a Tacky Polyurethane Outer Layer
NO TAPER - Exclusive Super Stroke Technology Used in the Super Stroke Fatso 5.0 Putter Grip for a More Consistent Stroke During Rounds of Golf
NON-SLIP GRIP - The CROSS-TRACTION Surface Texture Prevents the Super Stroke Fatso 5.0 Putter Grip User's Hands From Slipping During Increment Weather Conditions
LIGHTWEIGHT GRIP - The Super Stroke Fatso 5.0 Putter Grip Is Made of EVA Foam Which Gives Your Putter A Lightweight Grip for A Maximum Feel
TOUR PROVEN - The Super Stroke Fatso Series is One of the Most Popular Putter Grips Used on the PGA Tour by the Top Golfers in the World

specifications.Manufacturer: The Golf Shop of Wake Forest
